reviews.author: Local Coffee Lover
reviews.text: The selection of food is good and wide, including salads, bowls, croissants, sandwiches, some hot meals as well as the range of coffee. Perfect for breakfast!

reviews.author: Berlin Foodie
reviews.text: The Vollkornbrot with avocado was delicious! Discovered my favorite - the Knusprige Bacon. The pricing is a bit on top, but still fair for Prenzlauer Berg.

reviews.author: Regular Guest
reviews.text: Beautiful marble tables and modern minimalist ambiance. The coffee is freshly roasted weekly in Berlin. Great outdoor seating too!
